searching in notebooks of python func-
tions. The python functions can be in-
dexed by their docstrings, function
names, parameter names, return values,
etc.

label: 3. function: search_function
text:
Plan: TODO1. Imagine the docstring of
the function by the description2. Imag-
ine the function name by the descrip-
tion3. Imagine the parameter names by
the description4. Imagine the return
value by the description5. Search the
notebook by the above 4 things with
CodeDocsIndexer, CodeParamIndexer,
CodeReturnIndexer

label: 2. module: evonote.search.fine_searcher
text:
This module is for fine-grained search.
The object notebook will be put in the
prompt and LLM can select useful notes
by a certain criteria. However, fine-
grained search should not be adopted be-
cause it is slow and expensive.

id: module: evonote/module: evonote.testing/module: evonote.testing.testing_modules/module: evonote.testing.testing_modules.v_lab/section: Virtual lab
label: 1. section: Virtual lab
text:
In this virtual lab, you can do the
following things: 1. Create a beaker
with a maximum volume. 2. Add liquid to
the beaker. 3. Add solid to the beaker.
4. Put the beaker on a desk.

label: 1. class: Beaker
text:
A beaker is a container that can hold a
certain volume of liquid. This class
is used to represent the beaker in the
virtual lab.

label: 1. function: __init__
text: Create a beaker with a maximum volume.
